newsitem.title: USA: FSA qualifies 14 muni issues for bond insurance.
newsitem.headline: FSA qualifies 14 muni issues for bond insurance.

text.p: Financial Security Assurance said it has qualified for bond insurance the following 14 municipal issues scheduled for competitive sale today.
--San Francisco Airport $57 million revenue AMT bonds, $131 million of taxable revenue bonds and $61 million of AMT revenue bonds.
--Monticello Communtiy School District, Iowa, $4.4 million of GO school bonds.
--Wicomico County, Md., $6.2 million of public improvement bonds.
--Vadnais Heights, Minn., $4.3 million of GO tax increment bonds.
--N.E. Monmouth Sewer Authority, N.J., $12.480 refunding revenue bonds.
--Forest Cove MUD, Texas, $1.130 million waste water and san. sewer bonds.
